sentences.cn: 他是个真正有才干的人.

sentences.en: Miguel: If I could handle a stick like Billy Morales, I'd become a pool hustler.
sentences.cn: 如果我能像比利.莫拉雷斯那样操控球杆, 我就可以成为撞球赌客了.

sentences.en: Oh, the hustler will tell us.
sentences.cn: 噢, 这个活跃分子会告诉我们的.

sentences.en: Our neighbors paid thousands of dollars to that hustler.
sentences.cn: 我们的邻居被那个骗子骗了几千元.

sentences.en: Stay away from Jason. He's just a two - bit hustler.
sentences.cn: 别接近贾森, 他只是个不高明(注:本义为价值两角五分)的骗子.

sentences.en: To him the big trunk hustler was a subject for private contempt.
sentences.cn: 他私下里很瞧不起这个替人搬箱子的大个子家伙.

words.tran_cn: 赶紧；硬挤过去；拼命挣钱

trans.tran_cn: <美，非正>耍诡计骗钱的人，精力充沛、能干的人，<美，俚>妓女
trans.tran_en: someone who tries to trick people into giving them money
